data.strFullDescription:
[p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3048210/extras/Wishlist_Eng.gif?t=1737477985[/img]Imagine inheriting a farm AND a shop. What would you do with it?[/p][p]Yes, it's a mess. Yes, it needs work. But it's yours—and it’s free. In this economy?!
[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3048210/extras/SmallGif4.gif?t=1737477985[/img][/p][h2]Restore Your Farm[/h2][p]Transform this abandoned land into the thriving farm it deserves to be.[/p][p]Grow your own crops, take care of animals (coming soon), and upgrade your surroundings.[/p][p]It'll take effort, but soon you'll be able to acquire new tools, improve your buildings, and customize the farm of your dreams.
[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3048210/extras/SmallGif3.gif?t=1737477985[/img][/p][h2]Open Your Own Shop
[/h2][p]Why sell your crops and produce to someone else when you can do it yourself?[/p][p]Ever heard of a farmer's market? Well, this shop has the "farmer" part sorted.[/p][p]Organize your shop, manage the goods on your shelves, and handle all the finances![/p][p]Sell directly to customers, or hire some help—you’re only human, after all.
[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3048210/extras/SmallGif2.gif?t=1737477985[/img][/p][h2]Master the Art of Multitasking[/h2][p]Running a farm and a shop at the same time isn’t easy. But you’ve got this![/p][p]Balance your time between tending to crops, serving customers, and managing the chaos.[/p][p]Do it all yourself, or hire help and order goods that you don't produce (at least, not yet).[/p][p]Will you focus on strict business? Go personal and sustainable? Maybe a bit of both? Only you can decide.
[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3048210/extras/SmallGif1.gif?t=1737477985[/img][/p]
data.strSnippet: Start restoring your old family farm and managing your new shop in this free prologue. Grow your crops, sell your goods, and get the taste of what's to come in the full version. Did we already mention it's free?
